title: How to Catch Cresselia in Pok√©mon Black 2 and White 2

steps.title: Beat the Elite 4 and Champion.
steps.content: Beat the Elite 4 and Champion. You need to do this before you're able to catch Cresselia.

steps.title: Go to the house to the east of Reversal Mountain.
steps.content: Go to the house to the east of Reversal Mountain. Reversal Mountain is located east of Lentimas Town.

steps.title: Go down one of the stairwells to the bottom floor.
steps.content: Go down one of the stairwells to the bottom floor. Go back to the top floor, go up one of the stairwells, and a girl will appear.

steps.title: Repeat step 3, and after coming back from the bottom floor, go up the middle stairwell.
steps.content: Repeat step 3, and after coming back from the bottom floor, go up the middle stairwell. The girl will appear again. After she disappears, go into the middle room, and you'll find the Lunar Wing.

steps.title: Go to Marvelous Bridge.
steps.content: Go to Marvelous Bridge. It's located east of Nimbasa City.

steps.title: Go across the bridge until you're asked if you want to use the Lunar Wing.
steps.content: Go across the bridge until you're asked if you want to use the Lunar Wing. Say yes, and Cresselia will appear.

steps.title: Talk to Cresselia to battle it.
steps.content: Talk to Cresselia to battle it.
